title: Goblin Armory (1R173)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each time you play a [Moria] weapon, add (1). Response: If a [Moria] Orc is about to take a wound, discard this condition to prevent that wound.
Lore:	For scavenging vermin, the weapons of fallen foes are prized possessions.
Rarity:	R
